title: The Adventures of Kevin Bell: Coaching Hero

story.text: Kevin Bell discovers his superpower of empathy, allowing him to understand and alleviate people's deepest concerns instantly.
He uses his newfound abilities at a local seminar, helping attendees overcome personal and professional blocks.
News of his impact spreads, and he is invited to coach a struggling startup, harnessing his powers to boost team morale and productivity.
Kevin encounters his first challenge: a disbelieving skeptic who publicly challenges the legitimacy of his powers.
He wins over the skeptic at a public demonstration, where he transparently addresses the critic's past traumas, turning him into a supporter.
With his reputation solidified, Kevin creates a workshop for other coaches, teaching them how to harness similar empathic powers safely and ethically.
Taking a well-deserved break, Kevin reflects on the week's successes and plots out future strategies to expand his positive influence.

ending: As the sun set on a fulfilling week, Kevin Bell knew his journey as a coaching hero was just beginning.
moral: True superpowers lie within one's ability to positively impact and transform the lives of others.
